meanings.definition: To make five times as much or as many.
meanings.sent1: She was quintuplicating her savings by investing wisely.
meanings.sent2: The company decided to quintuplicate their production to meet the high demand.
meanings.sent3: The magician's hat seemed to be quintuplicating rabbits endlessly!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room, quintuplicating in intensity.
meanings.sent5: The sun's rays were quintuplicating the heat on the scorching day.

meanings.definition: To increase or multiply by five.
meanings.sent1: He was quintuplicating the recipe to serve a larger group.
meanings.sent2: The population of the town quintuplicated in just a decade.
meanings.sent3: The kids were quintuplicating their excitement as the birthday party approached.
meanings.sent4: The news of the victory quintuplicated their motivation to win the next game.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset were quintuplicating in the calm ocean waters.
